headline: Senate Republicans Block Witnesses, 51 to 49, Clearing a Path for the President’s Acquittal
abstract: The narrow vote came after Republican senators said they did not need to hear more evidence, and pressed toward acquitting President Trump next week.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Senate brought President Trump to the brink of acquittal on Friday of charges that he abused his power and obstructed Congress, as Republicans voted to block consideration of new witnesses and documents in his impeachment trial and shut down a final push by Democrats to bolster their case for the president’s removal.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
